cosmic_conquistadors

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosmic_conquistadors.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vector class provides a way to represent values with both scale and magnitude in two dimensions.

        public void clamp(Vector lower,
                  Vector upper)
        Clamps the Vector to the bounds lower and upper. Performs clamp on each element in the Vector
        Parameters:
        lower - the Vector lower bounds to clamp to
        upper - the Vector upper bounds to clamp to
